--0-1699692780-1223957953=:56316
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii


The tunnel seemed to widen abruptly, where there had been something much larger digging. A quick cursory scan revealed no other decernable tunnels, and switched to vernier mode and travel further. hovering just over the floor he focused on scanning for Rodimus or his captors. He was picking up some energty signatures, but having never seen them before, didn't know what to make of them. It was bothersome, but it'd just lead him to his goal in the end. "These pathetic Predacons and fools daring enough to call themselves Decepticons are going to regret every possible boast they have ever made. And trhen they will wish I was merciful and destroyed them quickly!"

--- On Fri, 10/10/08, xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

From: xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...>
Subject: Re: OOC: A Spark of Hope
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: Friday, October 10, 2008, 8:57 PM






OOC:

Hydras base's is Europe, The ark is near mtt sant helen and the 
Blackfortress need repairs

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@ ...> 
wrote:
>
> > OOC: the tunnel is clear for travel down to where the adjecent 
tunnel is,
> > though it won't be for long. Aso, I can't really post until i 
have an idea where
> > Rodimus is.
> 
> Rodimus is currently inside Scorponok and they are tunneling 
underground, making thier way near to Hydras' Base. I do not know how 
good Megatron's sensors are if they would be able to perceive him 
through all the tonnage of rock between them rock? I will leave that 
up to you. 
> 
> However, what I do need to know from Airly is where exactly is 
Hydras' base? I assumed it was on the contenant of America since they 
were so quickly able to get to Portland, Oregon - Where the Ark is? 
but I could be wrong. Also what condition is the Black Fortress in? 
Seeing as it just withstood an attack by ALOT of sweeps before they 
redirected themselves to the Ark. 
> 
> It would help me in my next posts as well. 
> 
> Thanks
> 
> Preston
>
